value.title: Microsoft Ignite: How Azure Percept will bring AI to the edge for the enterprise
value.excerpt: Microsoft unveiled a preview of Azure Percept at its Ignite digital conference on Tuesday. Percept is a platform of hardware and services intended to simplify how customers use Azure artificial intelligence technologies on the edge,

value.title: Microsoft Ignite Data and Analytics roundup: Platform extensions are the key theme
value.excerpt: Microsoft is introducing a new Apache Cassandra Azure service, while adding new onramps to Azure Synapse Analytics. And it’s the first third-party cloud to cleanroom engineer its own MongoDB 4.0 API.

value.title: Microsoft launches Azure Arc machine learning and container services
value.excerpt: Microsoft unveiled two new Azure Arc services aimed at data scientists and enterprises with containerized workloads.

value.title: RBAC support is now generally available on Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: At Microsoft's Ignite 2021 conference, the company has announced a host of new capabilities now available across its Azure Cognitive Search and Azure Machine Learning solutions. Additionally, it has also announced a bunch of features currently in preview ...

value.title: From the Data and AI Expert Labs: Break open your processes
value.excerpt: Today, I want to reinforce that you shouldn’t rely on a compelling incident. You don’t need to wait until a system breaks to make it better. value.title: IBM and the Recording Academy® Debut New Fan Experience powered by Watson and IBM Cloud, Ahead of the 63rd Annual GRAMMY Awards®
value.excerpt: "These are the same core technologies – hybrid cloud and AI – that we're using to drive digital transformation for clients around the world." In addition to GRAMMY Debates with Watson ...

value.title: Sonantic uses AI to infuse emotion in automated speech for game prototypes
value.excerpt: Sonantic has figured out how to use AI to turn written words into spoken words in a script, and it can infuse those words with the proper emotion. And it turns out this is a pretty good way to prototype the audio storytelling in triple-A video games.

value.title: Lionbridge Completes Sale of Artificial Intelligence (AI) Division to TELUS International
value.excerpt: Lionbridge, a global leader in translation and localization solutions, today confirmed the close of the previously announced sale of its artificial intelligence division, Lionbridge AI, to TELUS International,

value.title: AWS rekindles a crafty scheme to get developers into machine learning
value.excerpt: Three years ago, the company created AWS DeepRacer, a racing competition where enthusiasts from all over the world would develop a 1/18 scale race car and power it with a machine learning model.

value.title: Artificial intelligence SPAC Goldenbridge Acquisition prices $50 million IPO
value.excerpt: Goldenbridge Acquisition, a blank check company targeting the artificial intelligence industry, raised $50 million by offering 5 million units at $10. Each unit consists of one share of common stock;

value.title: Beam raises $80 million for AI-driven dental coverage that rewards good hygiene
value.excerpt: Beam Dental, a Columbus, Ohio-based dental benefits provider, today announced it has raised $80 million in an oversubscribed series E round led by Mercato Partners. Beam says the funds will be put toward expanding its offering to new markets,

value.title: Self-driving startup Aeva hires Waymo, Apple veteran to oversee supply chain
value.excerpt: Self-driving sensor startup Aeva Inc, founded by two Apple Inc alumni, has hired another former Apple executive to oversee manufacturing and supply chain operations ahead of an expected deal to become a public company later this month.

value.title: Automatic Speech Recognition Software Market Revenue Growth Predicted by 2021-2030 | Google, Baidu
value.excerpt: A consciously conceived and designed business intelligence report titled Global Automatic Speech Recognition Software market 2021 by Manufacturers, Type, and Application, Forecast to 2030 by MarketResearch.

value.title: India using facial recognition in schools is an ‘overreach’
value.excerpt: Rights advocates also say it is invasion of children’s privacy with no clarity on how the data is used or stored

value.title: Compute and storage updates are available for mission-critical applications on Azure
value.excerpt: Microsoft has announced a host of capabilities for mission-critical workloads on Azure include optimizations to compute, storage, backup, management, development, and networking.

value.title: As China Rises, the US Builds Toward a Bigger Role in AI
value.excerpt: After decades of staying out of industrial policy, a Pentagon-appointed commission recommends more spending on research and support for US chip makers.

value.title: Azure Percept: Edge intelligence from silicon to service
value.excerpt: In today’s fast-paced world, there is often a need for instantaneous, real-time responses. Companies are finding the computing needed to support this 24/7 mentality generates staggering amounts of data, often from devices out in the physical world.

value.title: Microsoft’s 10 Biggest Azure Announcements At Ignite 2021
value.excerpt: The Microsoft Ignite 2021 conference includes Microsoft Azure announcements such as the Azure Percept platform and tools for Azure migrations.

value.title: AI chip firm Wave Computing emerges from Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence chip designer Wave Computing Inc said on Monday it has emerged from Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection following an auction of the company and will rebrand the firm as MIPS.

value.title: IBM Cloud Satellite Enables Clients to Deliver Cloud Securely in Any Environment Including at the Edge
value.excerpt: ARMONK, N.Y., March 1, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- IBM (NYSE: IBM) today announced that its hybrid cloud services are now generally available in any environment -- on any cloud, on premises or at the ...

value.title: National Security Commission on Artificial Intelligence issues report on how to maintain U.S. dominance
value.excerpt: The National Security Commission on AI report makes recommendations ranging from 5G and China to immigration policy and civil rights.

value.title: How China’s synthetic media startup Surreal nabs funding in 3 months
value.excerpt: What if we no longer needed cameras to make videos and can instead generate them through a few lines of coding? Advances in machine learning are turning the idea into a reality. We’ve seen how deepfakes swap faces in family photos and turn one’s selfies into famous video clips.

value.title: Markforged, a 3D Printing Startup, Will Go Public in a SPAC Merger
value.excerpt: Per details of the deal, which is expected to be finalized sometime this summer, the combined valuation of the merged companies is expected to be $2.1 billion

value.title: Facebook Open-Sources AI Model to Predict COVID-19 Patient Outcomes
value.excerpt: A team from Facebook AI Research (FAIR) and New York University (NYU) School of Medicine has developed deep-learning models that use chest X-rays to predict COVID-19 patient prognosis. In a comparison study,

value.title: AWS reorganizes DeepRacer League to encourage more newbies
value.excerpt: AWS launched the DeepRacer League in 2018 as a fun way to teach developers machine learning, and it’s been building on the idea ever since. Today, it announced the latest league season with two divisions: Open and Pro.
